prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with vibrant feathers and a majestic wingspan.
I want a bird Pokemon that embodies grace and speed in its design.
Generate an avian Pokemon with a bright color palette and fierce expression.
Make a majestic Pokemon that rules the skies with its powerful wings.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a regal presence with a colorful crown-like feature.
Design a swift Pokemon with feathers that shimmer in the sunlight.
Show me a Pokemon that represents freedom and agility with its design.

distinctive_features: Crest on the head resembling a crown
